englishisfun.title: Daily Word
englishisfun.w1: I have no clue/I have no idea/I`ve the faintest idea = I dont know.
englishisfun.w2: Much appreciate/You`re the best/Cheers = Thank you.
englishisfun.w3: Anytime/My pleasure/The pleasure is mine/No worries = Your welcome.
englishisfun.w4: How`s life?/How do you do?/How is everything? = How are you?.
englishisfun.w5: Not too shabby/I am doing well/I am alive = I am fine.

physicsisfun.title: Daily Challenge
physicsisfun.question1: The radious of the earth is : R meters : and surrounds by a satellite which far from it`s land for : H meters : and the earth has it`s mass for : M kg : and it`s gravity on land is: g :calculate the following expression : How much satellite`s velocity is? (m/s)
